full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement
#### Inspection, Preventive Maintenance, and Repair Services for Garage Doors
#### Call Number: W6844-22M013

**Call Type and Method**:
* This is a Request for Proposal (RFP) under the competitive open bidding method.
* The selection criteria for this tender will be Lowest Price.

**Service Requirements**:
* The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PWGSC) invites proposals for the inspection, preventive maintenance, and repair services of garage doors at various locations in Montreal and Saint-Hubert.
* The services will be required at the following locations:
	+ Montreal Garrison
	+ Saint-Hubert Garrison
	+ Côte des-Neiges Armoury
	+ Laval Armoury
	+ Saint-Joseph Armoury in Montreal

**Submission Requirements**:
* All supporting documentation and bid submissions must be received by 14:00 hours EST on January 26, 2023.
* Late submissions will be declared non-responsive.

**Trade Agreements**:
* This tender is open to suppliers from various countries, including:
	+ Canada
	+ Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
	+ Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
	+ Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
	+ North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA)
	+ Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
	+ Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
	+ Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
	+ World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
	+ Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
	+ Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
	+ Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
	+ Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
	+ Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)

**Contact Information**:
* Julien Ratte, (SPAC/PSPC)
* Email: [julien.ratte@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:julien.ratte@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* Phone: None
* Fax: None

**Notice URL**:
* [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14970970?extsite=MTQ5NzA5NzBfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/
